list.title: House Blend
list.description: Smoky, strong, and assertive, just like us.

list.title: Organic French Roast
list.description: Smooth and mellow with hints of molasses.

list.title: Organic Decaf
list.description: Full bodied and rich, we promise you won't miss the caffiene.

description.text: Served to brave people in our notorious antique tea cups.

list.title: Ginger Hibiscus
list.description: Floral, tart, and spicy. Caffeine free.

list.title: Cascade Green
list.description: A blend of green teas hand selected by our master teamaker.

list.title: Chamomile
list.description: Soothing and slightly sweet. Try it with honey! Caffeine free.

list.title: Machiatto
list.description: Espressso and steamed milk, served in a demitasse cup. (Size Small Only)

list.title: Latte
list.description: Espresso with steamed milk, and sometimes a little art on top.

list.title: Mocha
list.description: Espresso with steamed chocolate milk and whipped cream. Also available with white chocolate milk.

list.title: Americano
list.description: 1 shot espresso, two shots hot water.

list.title: Mallory's Famous Snickerdoodles
list.description: Creamy cinnamony goodness made from scratch with our founder Mallory's prizewinning recipe.

list.title: Oatmeal Cookie
list.description: Packed with rolled oats, raisins, and cranberries, these monster cookies are (almost) good for ya!

list.title: Mixed Berry Muffins
list.description: Filled with the best berries of the season and topped with a crumb crust.

list.title: Croissant
list.description: Our oversized croissants are buttery, flaky, and usually all sold out by 7 a.m.
